speaker: Moss Path
lines: You walk a soft path covered in moss.
Your footprints spring back as you pass.
You step around a ring of mushrooms.
A beetle drags a leaf across the trail.
Light thins under the branches and cools the ground.
You pass a fresh stump with a sweet smell.
You hear a small laugh like water over stone.
A neat braid of grass crosses the path.

choices.text: Step over the braid without touching it.
Unpin the braid to see what changes.
Follow the laughter toward a clearing.
